thread.title: TNF What's Lincoln Thinkin' - Colts vs. Texans
thread.title_full: TNF What's Lincoln Thinkin' - Colts vs. Texans

title: TNF What's Lincoln Thinkin' - Colts vs. Texans
text:
TNF What's Lincoln Thinkin' - Colts vs. Texans 
By Matt Lincoln/CBS12Mystery surrounds the Colts matchup with the Texans on Thursday Night Football on CBS12.Who will start at quarterback for Indy?Andrew Luck missed his first start since being drafted last Sunday because of a sore shoulder and he is listed as questionable on the depth chart. But so is 40 year old backup quarterback Matt Hasselbeck, who led the Colts to a 16-13 OT win over Jacksonville Sunday. Indianapolis signed a third quarterback, Josh Johnson, basically off the street last week. It's likely either Luck or Hasselbeck will start Thursday night, and that is a big different for a Texans' defense that ranks 11th in the NFL in yards allowed.Houston has quarterback issues of their own. Head coach Bill O'Brien can't seem to make up his mind whether he believes Brian Hoyer or Ryan Mallett is the best quarterback to lead his offense. So far, both haven't been too bad - the Texans rank 7th in the league in yards. But at 1-3, Houston still feels like the more desperate team.Indianapolis is 2-2, and in first place all alone in what is likely the worst division in football. A win on the road, on a short week, short-handed at quarterback, against a division foe - might turn out to be one of the biggest wins of the year. TNF What's Lincoln Thinkin' - Colts vs. Texans 
Thursday, October 8 2015, 12:06 AM
